name: SSF4
title: CS Site-Specific Factor 4
subtitle: Number of Examined Pelvic Nodes
notes: **Note**: Record the number of examined pelvic lymph nodes documented in the patient record.  Apply the same instructions in General Rules, Part I for coding Regional Nodes Examined to this data item.
rows:
1 - 89 pelvic lymph nodes examined 
(Exact number of pelvic lymph nodes examined)
90 or more pelvic lymph nodes examined
No pelvic lymph nodes removed, but aspiration or core biopsy of pelvic lymph nodes performed
Pelvic lymph node removal documented as a sampling, but number of nodes unknown/not stated
Pelvic lymph node removal documented as a dissection, but number of nodes unknown/not stated
Pelvic lymph nodes surgically removed, but number of  nodes unknown/not stated and not documented as a sampling or dissection

OBSOLETE DATA CONVERTED V0200
See code 988

Not applicable for this site

Not applicable:  Information not collected for this case
(May include cases converted from code 888 used in CSv1 for "Not applicable" or when the item was not collected.  If this item is required to derive T, N, M, or any stage, use of code 988 may result in an error.)

Unknown if pelvic nodes examined; 
Not documented in patient record
